Text:
Hi im using XAMPP Version v3.2.2 an i tried to use an API with the PHP CURL Lib. But on every request i get this Error Message: 

> Protocol "curl https" not supported or disabled in libcurl

   

     $curl = curl_init();
     curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
       CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => 1,
       CURLOPT_URL => 'curl https://dawanda.com/[XYZ]/products?v=1.1',
       CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array('X-Dawanda-Auth: [XYZ]')
      ));
      $resp = curl_exec($curl);

      echo curl_error($curl);

      curl_close($curl);

[![Those are my CURL properties][1]][1]
      


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/RgRrO.jpg

I dont understand the error message, because the https-protocol is listed in the phpinfo().

Hi I'm using XAMPP Version v3.2.2 and I've tried to use an API with the PHP CURL Lib. But on every request I get this Error Message: 

> Protocol "curl https" not supported or disabled in libcurl

   

     $curl = curl_init();
     curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
       CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => 1,
       CURLOPT_URL => 'curl https://dawanda.com/[XYZ]/products?v=1.1',
       CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array('X-Dawanda-Auth: [XYZ]')
      ));
      $resp = curl_exec($curl);

      echo curl_error($curl);

      curl_close($curl);

[![Those are my CURL properties][1]][1]
      


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/RgRrO.jpg

I don't understand the error message, because the https-protocol is listed in the phpinfo().
